hero.subtitle: Let's build something together
hero.body: I'm a Full-Stack Web Devepoler specializing in building exceptional digital experiences based on functionalities as well as design. Currently, I'm learning new skill to improve my professional profile.

about.title: Me and The Developer
description: Since I had my first computer I was interested in the technological world and when I entered university I decided to study electricity, studies that helped me to form my perseverance, my desire to learn and improve myself.
With time I resumed my desire for the technological world and in 2022 I decided to study web development in a bootcamp, which I have complemented by learning autonomously.
Join me on this path where I am always eager to continue working and learning more.

body.title: About Me
description: I'm a Full-Stack developer located in Chile. I have a great passion for web development and I am constantly improving my knowledge.
Well-organised person, problem solver. Passionate about biking, the outdoors, cooking and the movies
Interested in projects that are challenging and allow creativity

projects.title: Puppy Point
projects.descriptionSmall: Aplicacion que conecta a paseadores de perros con personas que requieren de ese servicio
descriptionFull: Aplicación que busca solucionar el problema de pasear perros, esto a través de conectar a pasadores de mascota con dueños de mascotas que requieran de este servicio

projects.descriptionSmall: Aplicacion que se alimenta de la Api de Pokemon
descriptionFull: Aplicación que muestra en pantalla los distintos pokemons que existen, donde podras ver su detalle y agregarlos a favoritos.
